name: 28 Waves Later
description: 28 Waves Later - Try to survive when there's a swarm of monsters coming at you! Zombies won't let you rest even for a minute. Imagine you're in a closed space and zombies are closing in on you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8.1 Processor: Dual Core 3.0+ GHz or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
